title: Sampler, 1816
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidered in chain, button hole, satin, overcasting, threaded running, and knot stitches with needle made lace-loop and twist on plain weave foundation
description: Whitework sampler with seven plackets and eight button holes.  Two separate samplers sewn together.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1816.
1816. Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidered in chain, button hole, satin, overcasting, threaded running, and knot stitches with needle made lace-loop and twist on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-193.
